Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process has steps: C (Insurance Claim), CR, DV, RDS (optional), FC, II (optional), CA, AP (conditional on amount threshold), P, N, CL. There can be loops: between DV and RDS, and between FC and II.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The initial marking should place a token in a start place, representing a new claim arriving. The final marking should represent a closed claim. places representing states between these activities, transitions labeled with the activity names, and arcs connecting them to form a logical sequence with possible loops

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Lets define: - Start place: p_start. - Transition Insurance Claim (C) from p_start to p_claim_filed - transition t_CR (label Claim Registration (CR)) from p_claim_filed to p_claim_registered - transition t_DV (label Document Verification (DV)) from p_claim_registered to p_doc_verification

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: From p_doc_verification, we have two possible outgoing transitions: either go to FC (Fraud Check) if docs are ok, or go to RDS (Re-Document Submission) if docs are incomplete. After RDS, we need to go back to the place before DV to re-verify.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The loop is between DV and RDS. For FC -> (if doubts) -> II -> (back to FC) -> ... So its a loop from FC to II and back to FC.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: p_claim_registered -> transition DV -> p_doc_verification. Then p_doc_verification has two outgoing arcs: one to FC (to proceed) and one to RDS. The transition RDS leads back to p_claim_registered

Name: Validation - PE
Text: That models the loop: p_claim_registered -> DV -> p_doc_verification -> (either go to FC or loop back via RDS) -> p_claim_registered. Good.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: p_doc_verification -> FC -> p_fraud_checked. Then from p_fraud_checked we have two outgoing arcs: to CA (if passes) and to II (if doubts). Then II transition goes back to p_doc_verification

Name: Validation - PE
Text: That models the loop: p_doc_verification -> FC -> p_fraud_checked -> II -> p_doc_verification.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: transition t_C (label Insurance Claim (C)) from p_start to p_claim_filed ... petri_utils.add_arc_from_to(start, t_C, net) petri_utils.add_arc_from_to(t_C, p_claim_filed, net)
